Package lshfindex

Class LSHFIndexPage

java.lang.Object
diskmgr.Page
heap.HFPage
lshfindex.LSHFSortedPage
lshfindex.LSHFIndexPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
GlobalConst
public class LSHFIndexPage extends LSHFSortedPage
LSHFIndexPage is an index page in the LSH-Forest prefix tree. It stores <key, PageID> pairs, where key is the hash value (of type Vector100DKey) computed for 100D vectors and PageID is the pointer to the child node. We extend BTSortedPage to reuse the sorted storage mechanism. Left link functionality is omitted because the LSH scheme does not require it.

  • Constructor Details

    • LSHFIndexPage

      public LSHFIndexPage(PageId pageno, int keyType) throws IOException, ConstructPageException
      Constructs an LSHFIndexPage by pinning the page with the given PageId. Sets the node type to INDEX.
      Parameters:
      pageno - the PageId of the index page.
      keyType - the key type (should be AttrType.attrString for our hash keys).
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      ConstructPageException - if page construction fails.

    • LSHFIndexPage

      public LSHFIndexPage(Page page, int keyType) throws IOException, ConstructPageException
      Constructs an LSHFIndexPage by associating it with an existing Page. Sets the node type to INDEX.
      Parameters:
      page - the Page instance.
      keyType - the key type.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      ConstructPageException - if page construction fails.

    • LSHFIndexPage

      public LSHFIndexPage(int keyType) throws IOException, ConstructPageException
      Constructs a new LSHFIndexPage (allocating a new page). Sets the node type to INDEX.
      Parameters:
      keyType - the key type.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      ConstructPageException - if page construction fails.

  • Method Details

    • insertKey

      public RID insertKey(KeyClass key, PageId pageNo) throws IndexInsertRecException
      Inserts a <key, PageID> entry into the index page.
      Parameters:
      key - the key (hash value) to be inserted.
      pageNo - the PageId pointer to the child node.
      Returns:
      the RID where the entry was inserted, or null if no space left.
      Throws:
      IndexInsertRecException - if insertion fails.

    • getPageNoByKey

      public PageId getPageNoByKey(KeyClass key) throws IndexSearchException
      Searches for the child pointer (PageID) corresponding to the given key. The search is performed by scanning the sorted entries in the index page.
      Parameters:
      key - the key used in the search.
      Returns:
      the PageId of the child to be searched next.
      Throws:
      IndexSearchException - if the search fails.

    • getFirst

      public LSHFKeyDataEntry getFirst(RID rid) throws IteratorException
      Returns the first key-data entry on this index page.
      Parameters:
      rid - an output parameter that will contain the RID of the first entry.
      Returns:
      the first KeyDataEntry, or null if no entries exist.
      Throws:
      IteratorException - if an iteration error occurs.

    • getNext

      public LSHFKeyDataEntry getNext(RID rid) throws IteratorException
      Returns the next key-data entry on this index page.
      Parameters:
      rid - an input/output parameter containing the current RID; it is advanced.
      Returns:
      the next KeyDataEntry, or null if no more entries.
      Throws:
      IteratorException - if an iteration error occurs.
